body.name: TCL 65-Inch Q6 QLED 4K Smart TV with Fire TV (65Q650F, 2023 Model) Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, HDR Pro+, Voice Remote with Alexa, Streaming UHD Television
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 42 mins
features: 4K Ultra HD Resolution - Experience incredible detail with 4X the resolution of 1080p Full HDTVs.
QLED – Quantum Dot Technology with UltraWide Color Gamut - Enjoy over a billion colors for richer and more lifelike images.
HighBrightness Direct LED Backlight – Q6 models produce brighter images for enhanced viewing experience for all your favorite movies and TV shows.
Motion Rate 120 – Motion enhancement technology for improved motion clarity
HDR PRO plus (Dolby Vision, HDR10 plus, HDR10, and HLG) - Enjoy enhanced contrast, accurate colors and fine details utilizing all the most advanced HDR formats.

Fire TV Experience – All your entertainment in one place. Fire TV gives you quick access to live TV, video games, music, and lets you stream over 1 million movies and TV episodes. Subscriptions may apply.
Auto Game Mode (ALLM) – Automatically enables game mode for the lowest possible input lag and latency for exceptional gaming performance.
FullView Metal Bezel-less Design - Elegant edge-to-edge screen design
Bluetooth Personal Audio – Pair your favorite Bluetooth headphones to the TV for a private listening experience.
Press and ask Alexa to easily find, launch, and control your content, check the weather, sports scores, control compatible smart home devices, and more.
body.description: TCL Q Class Smart TVs combine premium picture technology with outstanding value for endless entertainment. QLED Quantum Dot technology and HDR PRO+ with Dolby Vision you can enjoy enhanced contrast, accurate colors and fine details. Motion Rate 120 adds exceptional motion clarity. TCL’s HighBrightness Direct LED Backlight produces brighter images for an enhanced viewing experience for all your favorite movies and TV shows. Beyond movies and TV shows you can get in the game with Auto Game Mode (ALLM) automatically enables game mode for the lowest possible input lag and latency for exceptional gaming performance. TCL Q Class Smart TVs: Compelling Color and Choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super picture, amazing price
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from a 10 year old 60" Sharp 1080p that had a great picture but did not have smart features. I wasn't sure the picture would be an upgrade, but I was tired of having to switch between the firestick for smart features and the tv remote for antenna and HDMI functions.This did not disappoint. The footprint of this 65" is not much bigger than the old 60" because of the edge to edge picture. The sound is much better as well, I had to use a soundbar with the sharp because of the thin sounding speakers. The picture is outstanding, I'm just using the factory settings-mainly standard but occasionally switching to Movie and Dynamic. I haven't set any Custom pictures up yet, but will in the future. It's lighter as well and I was able to use the same slim mount as my older tv. Lighter is definitely more manageable. The power and inputs are easy enough to access even with it being mounted close to the wall.This is really a great tv with a ton of features for the money-It's quite a bit cheaper than what I paid for the smaller 60" tv 10 years ago--not many things are better and cheaper than they were 10 years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this TV on Cyber Monday offer deal. Received the product just outside of my door on the specified date. The picture quality is very good and pleasant. Alexa integration is a great addition to the TV and greatly helps in navigating channels and sites. Happy customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Game Mode causes micro stutters
reviews.reviewText: Fine for watching TV, if you want to game on this good luck, game mode causes stutters every 5 to 10 seconds and with game mode off the input lag is unbearable, TCL claims it’s not an issue with they tv, apparently both my PS5’s, and Nintendo switch are the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A very good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: We love this TV. It is easier to read the written text from a distance, and the picture quality is better than our previous TV. The price was amazing, and we are very satisfied. We would like a better image, but the price to get that is out of our budget range. Very satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tv is exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a reasonably priced tv but still have a good picture quality. The sound quality is good we have a sound bar which we used for our old tv but still haven’t plugged it in with this one. This is the first time using a fire tv as they have all been Roku’s and I quite like it. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall great value
reviews.reviewText: The first time I ordered it arrived cracked, but the return process was fast and decently easy. I re-ordered the second time with free setup so they could ensure it was okay and worked, and recieved my replacement in under a week. This is my first large smart tv, and I was actually very impressed with the picture and sound quality. Setup is pretty easy and straightforward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
